body:
Comment 8: 
It doesn't preclude the Windows port.  It just means it needs
to be fixed as part of the Windows port.  A good way to start
the Windows port would probably to be to use cygwin or
mingw anyway.  It's been 10 years since C99.  If worst comes
to worst, we can remove these when the rest of the Windows
port is ready.
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **WontFix**._
